info.title: CityBikes API Documentation
info.description:
This API documentation explains how to use the CityBikes API for developers. 

It leverages Redoc to enhance the  [existing documentation](https://api.citybik.es/v2/) by elaborating  on all avaliable endpoints, requests and responses, schemas, error codes, authentication requirements, and examples. 

[CityBikes](https://www.citybik.es/), powered by  [PyBikes](https://github.com/eskerda/pybikes),  is an open-source project providing information about global  bike-sharing transportation services.  

*Last updated: March 16, 2024*
# Authentication  
No authentication or API key required. 
# Base URL  
The base URL for the API is `http://api.citybik.es/v2`

tags.name: Networks
tags.description:
A network is a collection of bikes available for a short-term rental.   

Data for a network includes information about the networks, their  names, IDs, stations, available bikes, and locations.

tags.name: Field Filtering

get.description: This endpoint provides data about all available bike networks,  including their names, IDs, locations, and associated companies.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Fields to filter for; results will render only filtered values.

get.summary: GET data about a specific bike network
get.description:
This endpoint provides data about a specific bike network, including  all the available stations and bikes.  

A **station** is a dock from which a bike can be rented and returned to.

parameters.name: network_id
parameters.description: The ID of the bike network.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Fields to filter for; results will render only filtered values.

200.description: Detailed information about a bike network.

network.description: Information about the network's location, name, ID, and stations.

BikeNetworks.description: Information about avaliable global bike networks.

BikeNetworkDetailed.description: Detailed information about a singular bike network.

company.description: List of companies involved with the bike network.

id.description: The ID of the bike network.

name.description: The name of the bike network.

stations.description: List of all the network's bike stations.

BikeNetworkSummary.description: Summarized information about a singular bike network.

company.description: List of companies involved with the bike network.

id.description: The ID of the bike network.

name.description: The name of the bike network.

Location.description: The location of a bike network.

Station.description: A dock from which a bike can be rented and returned to.

empty_slots.description: The number of empty spaces avaliable in the bike station.

free_bikes.description: The number of bikes avaliable at the bike station.

id.description: The unique ID of the bike station.

latitude.description: The latitude coordinate of the bike station.

longitude.description: The longitude coordinate of the bike station.

name.description: The name of the bike station.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of the last time station info was updated in the system.

ExtraStationInfo.description: Extra information about a bike station.

slots.description: The total number of bike slots in the station.

uid.description: The unique identifier of the station.

address.description: Address location of the bike station.

online.description: Whether or not the bikes are online.

normal_bikes.description: The number of regular bikes at the station.

e_bikes.description: The number of e-bikes at the station.
